response.overview: Channel 7 and former AFL player and football filmmaker Rob Dickson presents an amazing all access look into our unique Australian Game - Australian Rules Football. Hosted and narrated by Nathan Buckley, the Essence Of The Game was allowed into the dressing rooms during the entire 2008 season to take a behind-the-scenes look at what makes football clubs tick! The documentary also celebrates the bre
response.title: The Essence Of The Game
